actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for grants to enable States to carry out activities to reduce administrative costs and burdens in health care.
short_title: Reducing Administrative Costs and Burdens in Health Care Act of 2018

summary.text:
Reducing Administrative Costs and Burdens in Health Care Act of 2018

This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services to take a series of actions to reduce unnecessary costs and administrative burdens in the health care system, including a grant program for states to establish commissions targeting such costs.

titles.title: Reducing Administrative Costs and Burdens in Health Care Act of 2018
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for grants to enable States to carry out activities to reduce administrative costs and burdens in health care.
Reducing Administrative Costs and Burdens in Health Care Act of 2018
